turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Stephanie, are you still downtown, could you pick me up some Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'm near the Starbucks on 1st, just off the Hennepin Avenue bridge in Minneapolis.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I was hoping to get a Vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like? Also, any specific choice on the type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll have a medium, what is that called at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A medium at Starbucks is a grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I'll have a grande then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any specific milk you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could I please have skim milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep no problem, one grande vanilla latte with skim milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'm sorry, scratch that, could I have almond milk instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want almond milk instead of skim?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok one grande vanilla latte with almond milk coming up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you make that iced as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, no problem, any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good on the food, but thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'm in line, ordering soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, feel free to get yourself something, see you at the office!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you soon.
